original_title: ลอง ลีฟ เลิฟว์!
overview: The story of a disheartened couple, Sati and Metta. The two are about to part ways due to their broken relationship, but destiny is playing a joke on them when Sati gets into an accident and wakes up with amnesia. The only way to bring back parts of his memory is to retrieve old photographs where he is faced with his awful past.
tagline: We Can Hated The Loved, Can We Love The Hated Again?
title: Long Live Love!
